page.title: 05WEST SIDE OF LOSSIEMOUTH.
page.content: In this part of the town,there is one Take-away food shop,one Food shop and one Non-Food shop.There is a large car-park ,an Episcopal church,a Primary school and a High school which caters for the local children and the children from the neighbouring,small coastal towns.Beside the High school are spacious football pitches with a play area provided for small children. There are Local Authority and Private housing as well as R.A.F.Married Quarters,in this area. There is one hotel and a Public House.Across the road from the hotel is the Moray Golf Club.Whilst down by the beach is the local Sailing Club which is very popular all the year round.
